name: Bulma
description: A responsive multi-purpose theme based on the Bulma CSS framework
author: Marc Anton Dahmen

tooltips.appleTouchIcon: The file to be used as Apple touch icon
tooltips.bulmaCss: An optional custom Bulma CSS file
tooltips.brand: The markup or text used for the navbar brand
tooltips.carouselHeight: The relative height for the carousel images
tooltips.checkboxHideSignIn: Hide the sign in link in the footer section
tooltips.checkboxHideTeaser: Hide the page title and teaser text
tooltips.checkboxNavbarDark: Use a dark color scheme for the Navbar
tooltips.checkboxNavbarRight: Show navbar menu on the right side
tooltips.checkboxShowAllPagesInPagelist: Show not only children but all pages in the pagelist
tooltips.checkboxShowInFooter: Show a link to this page in the footer menu
tooltips.date: Set a date to show up as post or project info
tooltips.favicon: The file to be use as favicon
tooltips.formatDate: The format for displaying the date of a page
tooltips.formatDateBlog: The date format used for blog posts
tooltips.images: The file pattern for the image collection or carousel slideshow
tooltips.imageTeaser: The filename of the image to show up in the teaser section
tooltips.itemsFooter: Additional markup to be added to page's footer
tooltips.itemsHeader: Additional markup to be added to page's <head></head> section
tooltips.labelMore: Optional label text for the "More" buttons
tooltips.labelNext: Optional label text for the next page button
tooltips.labelShowAll: Label text for filter button when no filter is selected
tooltips.logo: The path to your logo - this variable should be defined globally in the shared data section
tooltips.logoHeight: The height of your logo - this variable should be defined globally in the shared data section
tooltips.placeholderSearch: Placeholder text for the search field of the main menu
tooltips.showPagesBelow: Define an alternative URL to be used as the pagelist's parent page, instead of the current one
tooltips.sortPages: Define sorting order of pagelist items - for example 'date desc' or ':path asc'
tooltips.templateFilter: Filter the pagelist by template names (regex)
tooltips.text: The main content of the page
tooltips.textContact: Contact information for a profile page
tooltips.textTeaser: The content of the teaser section
tooltips.urlActionButton: The URL to a page to be shown in the navbar as a primary action button
tooltips.urlSearchResults: The URL of the pagelist page to show the search results
tooltips.urlTagLinkTarget: The target URL of the pagelist page for the tag buttons
